resources.string:
TeamUP! was initially conceived at zero-dark-stupid while doing 8-ct body builders. Two of the author’s teammates had fallen back asleep after texting that they were ‘up’ and on time. As a result, the team was late to the early morning workout and the cadre ensured they Paid The Man before beginning the day. 

 “Wouldn’t it be nice to avoid this for the future?”
 “Someone should build an app for that…” 

 So, young bucks paying your dues, here you go! 

 This app is FREE, a gift from the greybeard author to the next generation. The server that runs it costs real money, however. See below for the current account balance and burn rate. If it’s running low – Officers, click on the balance to throw in a few bucks and keep the lights on.
